name: Formerly, A Confession
description:
"Today is a great day, isn't it?" Formerly, A Confession is a short visual novel about reconnecting with your childhood friend, and growing up. It was made for My First Game Jam Winter 2021.

The full dev-log is here: https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2021/topic/1147494/formerly-a-confe...

Story:

You've been gone for a year away to study in another city. In the meanwhile, your childhood friend Kiyon was completing his final year at high school. Now that year is finally slowing down, Kiyon invites you to his 18th birthday party. And this might be the last time you two can talk like this again. 

Features:
  • Changeable Name and Pronouns, default Dani
  • 1 CG
  • 2 endings
  • 8k words
  • A cute anime boy and his snarky little sister
